info.name: Oasis
info.attribution:
The room layout and game design is by LawDawg96 and released to the Public Domain by CC0. The desert icon is by Flaticon and is available under the Flaticon license: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/desert The waterfall icon is by Delapouite and is available under CC BY 3.0: https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/waterfall.html The oasis card back is available under the Pixabay License: https://pixabay.com/illustrations/oasis-oases-nature-desert-sand-4701493/ The oasis room background is available under the Pixabay License: https://pixabay.com/photos/huacachina-oasis-ica---peru-930676/

Library image generated using the Midjourney artificial intelligence image generator, https://www.midjourney.com/home/, using the following prompt: "circular oasis in the Sahara colored pencil drawing --ar 1:1 --v 5.1"
info.description: Players start with 4 cards. Play cards face down until one player challenges. Highest bidder then flips stated number of cards. If player flips all 'good' cards and no 'bad' ones, player wins challenge. First player to win two challenges wins.
info.helpText: Players take seats. Card count for each player is to the right of the player name. Drag lost cards to the trash icon. Press the hand in holder icon to return cards to a player's hand. Press colored edge of player holder to "flip" it over (indicated by dashed line) to show that player has won one round.
